System Architecture

7-Layer Palantir-Grade Blockchain Intelligence Platform

PRODUCTION READYSOC-2 COMPLIANTFOUNDRY-STYLE

Onchain Command Center Architecture

Built with enterprise-grade scalability, security, and compliance in mind. Each layer provides distinct capabilities while seamlessly integrating with others.

🔐
LAYER 0

Identity & Access

Cloud IAM with BigQuery column-level ACLs and Cloud DLP redaction

Services

  • Access Control

  • Audit Logging

  • Cloud DLP

Technologies

Cloud IAMBigQuery ACLsCloud DLPSOC-2

Key Features

  • Role-based access

  • Column-level security

  • Audit trails

  • Data masking

↓

📥
LAYER 1

Ingestion Layer

Cloud Functions → Pub/Sub → Dataflow pipeline for real-time blockchain data

Services

  • Ethereum Ingestion

  • Data Pipeline

Technologies

Cloud FunctionsPub/SubDataflowBigQueryTheGraph

Key Features

  • Real-time ingestion

  • Multi-chain support

  • Event normalization

  • Scalable pipeline

↓

🧠
LAYER 2

Semantic Fusion Layer

Ontology service with GraphQL and AI-powered entity resolution

Services

  • Ontology Service

  • Graph API

  • Entity Resolution

Technologies

GraphQLNeo4j AuraVertex AIDataplex

Key Features

  • Knowledge graph

  • Entity matching

  • Relationship mapping

  • Semantic queries

↓

🤖
LAYER 3

Intelligence & Agent Mesh

Vertex AI pipelines with GKE agent mesh for MEV, fraud, and risk detection

Services

  • MEV Watch Agent

  • Analytics Dashboard

  • Risk Intelligence

Technologies

Vertex AIGKEGBDTGraph-SAGEAuto-encoders

Key Features

  • Anomaly detection

  • MEV monitoring

  • Fraud detection

  • Risk scoring

↓

🚪
LAYER 4

API & VoiceOps Layer

gRPC + REST APIs with WebSocket streaming and ElevenLabs voice integration

Services

  • API Gateway

  • VoiceOps Service

Technologies

gRPCRESTWebSocketCloud RunElevenLabs

Key Features

  • Unified API

  • Real-time streaming

  • Voice commands

  • TTS/STT

↓

📊
LAYER 5

Visualization Layer

Palantir Foundry-style interactive dashboards and analytical interfaces

  • DeckGL Explorer

  • Time Series Canvas

  • Compliance Map

  • Foundry Workspace

Technologies

Deck.GLWebGLPlotly.jsD3React DnD

Key Features

  • Real-time charts

  • Drag-drop dashboards

  • WebGL rendering

↓

🏗️
LAYER 6

UX & Workflow Builder

Next.js war room with Dagster workflow builder and multi-platform integration

Services

  • Status Dashboard

  • Workflow Builder

  • Health Monitoring

Technologies

Next.jsChakraUIDagsterSlackMS Teams

Key Features

  • Visual workflows

  • Real-time dashboards

  • Multi-platform

  • Low-code builder

Data Flow Architecture

Information flows seamlessly through each layer, from raw blockchain data to actionable intelligence

📊

Data Ingestion

Raw blockchain events → Normalized JSON → BigQuery storage

🧠

Intelligence Processing

Entity resolution → AI analysis → Signal generation

💡

User Experience

Interactive dashboards → Analyst workflows → Actions
